fields.name: Ski Adventure - Banff, Canada
fields.brief_description: Explore the snowy landscapes of Banff, Canada, with skiing, snowboarding, and winter activities in the beautiful Canadian Rockies.

fields.name: Historical Wonders - Rome, Italy
fields.brief_description: Delve into the rich history of Rome with visits to the Colosseum, Vatican, and ancient ruins. Perfect for history lovers and foodies alike.

fields.name: Culture and Beaches - Bali, Indonesia
fields.brief_description: Discover the beautiful beaches, temples, and unique culture of Bali. Includes a guided tour to Ubud, a visit to the Sacred Monkey Forest, and beach relaxation.

fields.name: Safari - Cape Town & Kruger, South Africa
fields.brief_description: Experience South Africa’s stunning landscapes and wildlife on a safari tour. Includes visits to Cape Town, Table Mountain, and Kruger National Park.

fields.name: Inca Trail - Machu Picchu, Peru
fields.brief_description: Embark on a guided trek along the historic Inca Trail, leading to the ancient city of Machu Picchu. Ideal for adventure seekers and history buffs.

fields.name: Luxury Shopping & Desert Safari - Dubai, UAE
fields.brief_description: Enjoy a blend of modern luxury and traditional Arabian culture. Highlights include a desert safari, Burj Khalifa, and luxury shopping.

fields.name: Holiday Season Spectacular -New York, USA
fields.brief_description: Spend Christmas in the bustling city of New York, with festive lights, ice skating at Rockefeller Center, and holiday shopping.

fields.name: Northern Lights Adventure - Iceland
fields.brief_description: Witness the magical Northern Lights and explore Iceland’s natural wonders, including waterfalls, geysers, and glaciers.

fields.name: Luxury Beach Retreat - Maldives
fields.brief_description: Unwind in a private villa in the Maldives, with crystal-clear waters and luxurious amenities. Perfect for those looking to relax in paradise.

fields.name: Art & Cuisine Tour - Paris
fields.brief_description: Indulge in the culinary and artistic delights of Paris. Tour includes visits to the Louvre, Eiffel Tower, and cooking classes with local chefs.

fields.name: Cherry Blossom Season - Kyoto,Japan
fields.brief_description: Discover the ancient temples and colourful cherry blossoms of Kyoto. Includes visits to historic sites and guided cherry blossom viewing tours.

fields.name: Romantic Getaway - Santorini, Greece
fields.brief_description: Experience the breathtaking sunsets, white-washed buildings, and crystal-clear waters of Santorini. Ideal for couples seeking a romantic escape.
